name: Space Fan-tan (Playing cards)
description:
That popular cartoon "Space Brothers" appeared Become a fan-tan of the card game!
Do you can win a variety of characters who are Muta and Hibito and Makabe, Celica etc ?
This is a card game of an easy rule and an easy operation to understand just where to put! Let's challenge!

[The rule of "Fan-tan"]
- You can take out the card adjacent to the card at a central place.
(Example: If the number of a set card is 7, 6 or 8 can be taken out)
- The first player who succeeds in playing all your or opponent's cards is the winner.
- When you cannot take out a card. Please choose a "pass".
- You "can pass" 3 times.
- It will become game over if you turn a "pass" four.
